title: Men's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Maloja Size chart limited Manufacturer Warranty: freeride mountain biking Recommended Use: 2 front, 2 rear Pockets: no Removable Chamois: no Chamois: belt loops with button closure Waist: regular Fit: [Freeride Oxford] 100% nylon Material: Tech Specs The Maloja AxelM. Pant is available in five sizes from Small to XX-Large and in the colors Blue Steel and Granite. To ensure a free range of movement, the pant has been given softshell inserts at strategically placed points of stress -- the inner-leg and rear panel. The inserts provide more flexibility and stretch, and they also aid in external water repellency and moisture expulsion. To further keep water out of the pant, the ankles and waist have fully-adjustable
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
